targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (span_name) (traces_spanmetrics_latency_sum{service_name="formae-agent", span_name=~"query.*|prepare.*"}) / sum by (span_name) (traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{service_name="formae-agent", span_name=~"query.*|prepare.*"}))
